attributes.action: That MP's should forefit there next payrise and instead add it to the soldiers 3% annual payrise instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the complete Expenses scandal MP's should foefit there right for a payrise on the next increase and instead it should be added to the Armed forces crap 3% annual payrise. We the soldiers of the British Armed Forces are sick to death of crap wages and should get better pay and a bigger training budget(We are not aloud heating as it costs too much)

rejection.details: The PM does not set the pay for MPs. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
